item.title: Meetings: Guerilla Collaboration
item.description: As I’ve mentioned on twitter a few times my current team has a lot of meetings and apart from using the passive aggressive approach that Toby Tripp’s meeting ticker provides I’ve also been flicking through Chapter 19, 'Guerilla Collaboration', of Jean Tabaka’s 'http://www.amazon.com/Collaboration-Explained-Facilitation-Software-Project/dp/0321268776/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1288536162&sr=8-1[Collaboration Explained: Facilitation skills for software project leaders]' which gives other ideas. I’ve also seen some useful ideas that my colleagues have used in meetings that I’ve been part of.
